snippet: Thirteen Iranians whose fishing vessel had been seized by pirates in November were rescued by the United States Navy in the North Arabian Sea, the Pentagon announced on Friday.
abstract: Thirteen Iranians whose fishing vessel had been seized by pirates in November were rescued by the United States Navy in the North Arabian Sea, the Pentagon announced on Friday.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and J. DAVID GOODMAN

lead_paragraph: Updated | 6:33 p.m. In the middle of a tense standoff between Iran and the United States, the crew of an American destroyer patrolling the North Arabian Sea rescued 13 Iranian fishermen who had been taken hostage by Somali pirates more than a month ago, the Pentagon announced on Friday.

headline.main: U.S. Navy Rescues Iranians Held by Pirates

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
